pricingPage.title: Simple and transparent pricing
pricingPage.subtitle: No hidden fees. No surprises. Choose the plan that fits your fleet.

q1.question: Are there hidden fees?
q1.answer: No. The displayed price includes everything: hosting, updates, basic support. Only additional training and custom development are charged separately.

q2.question: Can I change plans?
q2.answer: Yes, you can upgrade at any time. Downgrading is possible at the end of your commitment period.

q3.question: What is the minimum commitment?
q3.answer: 12-month commitment with monthly or annual payment option (-10% for annual payment).

demoPage.title: See FleetOps Pro in action
demoPage.subtitle: 30 minutes personalized presentation with an expert. Discover how to reduce costs and optimize your fleet.
demoPage.noCommitment: No commitment. An expert will contact you within 24h.

faqPage.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faqPage.subtitle: Quickly find answers to your questions about our solutions.

q1.question: What is FleetOps Pro?
q1.answer: FleetOps Pro is a complete fleet management solution. It includes 8 integrated modules: Fleet & GPS, Planning, Maintenance, Supply Chain, Job Sites, Workforce, Products, and Dashboard. Everything is designed to reduce your costs and optimize your fleet utilization.

q2.question: What is Daedalia AI?
q2.answer: Daedalia AI is an intelligent copilot for Odoo. It allows you to interact with your ERP in natural language: create quotes, search for products, analyze your sales, all in one sentence. No more navigating through complex menus.

q3.question: Which industries are your solutions suited for?
q3.answer: FleetOps Pro is suited for 6 main industries: Transport & Logistics, Construction, Vehicle Rental, Mining & Quarries, Manufacturing, and Public Sector. Each industry benefits from features specific to its needs.

q1.question: How long does it take to deploy FleetOps Pro?
q1.answer: Deployment typically takes 2 to 4 weeks depending on your fleet size. This includes configuration, data import, GPS hardware installation, and team training.

q2.question: Do you provide GPS hardware?
q2.answer: Yes, we offer different GPS tracking solutions suited to your vehicles (cars, trucks, construction equipment). Hardware is billed separately. If you already have compatible trackers, we can integrate them.

q3.question: Is training included?
q3.answer: Yes, initial training is included in your subscription. We train your administrators and users on how to use the platform. Additional training sessions are available on request.

q4.question: Can I integrate FleetOps Pro with my existing ERP?
q4.answer: Yes, FleetOps Pro has a complete API that allows integration with most market ERPs (Odoo, SAP, Sage, etc.). Integration is included in the Enterprise plan.

q1.question: What is the price of FleetOps Pro?
q1.answer: Pricing starts at EUR 500/month for small fleets (1-20 vehicles). For fleets of 21 to 100 vehicles, the price is EUR 1,500/month. Above 100 vehicles, we offer custom pricing.

q2.question: Are there any hidden fees?
q2.answer: No, our pricing is transparent. The subscription includes platform access, updates, initial training, and support. The only additional costs are GPS hardware (if needed) and any custom integrations.

q3.question: What is the commitment period?
q3.answer: The minimum commitment is 12 months to benefit from standard pricing. No-commitment plans are available with a 20% surcharge. You can cancel with 3 months notice.

q1.question: How do I contact support?
q1.answer: You can contact us by email, phone, or WhatsApp. Professional and Enterprise plan customers benefit from priority phone support. Support is available Monday to Friday, 9am-6pm. 24/7 support for Enterprise customers.

q2.question: Do you offer additional training?
q2.answer: Yes, we offer advanced training sessions for your teams, whether for new users or to deepen knowledge of certain features. These trainings can be conducted on-site or remotely.

q3.question: What is the platform availability?
q3.answer: FleetOps Pro guarantees 99.9% availability. The platform is hosted on secure servers with daily automatic backups. An SLA is available for Enterprise customers.

q1.question: Is my data secure?
q1.answer: Yes, security is our priority. All data is encrypted in transit (TLS) and at rest. Servers are hosted in certified data centers. Automatic backups are performed daily.

q2.question: Are you GDPR compliant?
q2.answer: Yes, FleetOps Pro is GDPR compliant. You maintain full control of your data. We can provide a DPA (Data Processing Agreement) on request.

q3.question: What happens if I cancel my subscription?
q3.answer: You can export all your data before your subscription ends. We retain your data for 30 days after cancellation, then it is permanently deleted. A complete export is provided on request.

pricing.label: Pricing
pricing.title: Plans tailored to your size
pricing.subtitle: Start small, grow with us
pricing.guarantee: 30-day satisfaction guarantee - If you're not satisfied, we'll refund you. No questions asked.

items.question: How long does it take to deploy FleetOps Pro?
items.answer: 48 hours to be operational. Our team configures your account, imports your existing data, and trains your teams. No infrastructure needed - everything is cloud-based. For enterprise deployments with complex integrations, allow 2-4 weeks.

items.question: Does it work with my current system (Odoo, SAP, Excel)?
items.answer: Yes, we integrate with everything. Odoo, SAP, Sage, Salesforce, and even your Excel files. Our Integration module connects your existing systems in real-time. No need to change everything - we adapt to you.

items.question: What ROI can I expect?
items.answer: On average, our clients see a positive ROI within 6 months: -40% on maintenance costs, -60% on admin management time, +35% productivity. For a 50-vehicle fleet, that's about EUR 50,000 in annual savings.

items.question: Is my data secure?
items.answer: Maximum security. Hosted on certified servers in Europe, AES-256 encryption, GDPR compliant, automatic daily backups. Your data belongs to you - full export available at any time.

items.question: Is there a minimum commitment?
items.answer: No long-term commitment. Monthly subscription, cancellable at any time. We bet on the quality of our product, not on contracts that trap you. 14-day free trial available.

aboutPage.title: AI that transforms African industry
aboutPage.subtitle: Kaalytics develops concrete AI solutions for African businesses. Our mission: make artificial intelligence accessible and useful, with measurable ROI.

story.label: Our story
story.title: Born from a simple observation
story.p1: In 2024, while AI was revolutionizing businesses in Europe and the United States, African companies were left behind. Not for lack of interest, but for lack of solutions adapted to their realities.
story.p2: Existing tools were either too expensive, too complex, or simply not suited to local constraints: intermittent connectivity, multilingualism, specific business processes.
story.p3: Kaalytics was born from this observation: creating AI solutions that really work for African businesses, with local support and measurable ROI from the first months.

impact.title: Measurable impact
impact.desc: No vague promises. Every solution we deploy must demonstrate concrete and measurable ROI for our clients.

simplicity.title: Simplicity
simplicity.desc: AI should be invisible. Our users don't need to understand machine learning to benefit from it daily.

proximity.title: Proximity
proximity.desc: We are present on the ground. Training, support, guidance: we don't leave our clients alone facing technology.

team.label: The team
team.title: A passionate team
team.desc: Kaalytics is driven by a team of engineers and business experts passionate about AI and its concrete application to African industrial challenges. Our goal: make technology accessible and impactful for businesses on the continent.

cta.title: Ready to transform your business?
cta.desc: Let's discuss your challenges and discover together how AI can help you.
